post.body: That man just said the Palestinian lives lost are worthless This attitude does nothing but reinforce Western hegemonic intent.
off of writing just recently, 5 pounds, so 10 bucks US. I was stoked.
That was my 2.4 seconds of fame, now I must wait until I write something publishable and worthwhile. I made my 1st money off
You know what? Dogs don't sniff before a projectile fired from a mile up hits these people. Only ground forces utilize them
Yeah that's hilarious, made my day.
You know what would be interesting, showing the public the maps from 1948-present of Israel. Let them see the land grab.
Humans look for justification in their actions, yet they disgrace the basic tenets of their faith by justifying with faith.
I'm really glad you are bringing this up with regards to religion. But I think our problem is simply the belief in a God.
The embodiment of the inquisition. Wow I was writing that right when you said it.
Loved "Unbreakable" though, now that was a good flick.
Terrible, Shamalan or however you spell it is absurd these days. That was an overproduced mess.
Yeah, I'm off school right now, so toooooooooo much time on my hands. Getting a lot of writing done though. haha
Hard to begin, John Travolta's son dying is a lead story, ludicrous. Not saying it's not sad, but things are a bit hectic elsewhere.
Kauffman? Ewing from the Royals? Don't know much about him, Pohlad had tight pockets. Maybe anything on the East or West coast.
haha I just got on t.v. look at me eesh.
4:10 in the morning, and the letters are still not fuzzy, gettin stuff done.
Yeah, I'm off school right now, so toooooooooo much time on my hands. Getting a lot of writing done though.
Well that's not good. http://news.bbc.co.uk/2/hi/africa/7812868.stm
We should just shut off.
Why do we even have a media in this cuntry?
